ALERT.TITLE: Please Update
ALERT.MESSAGE: There is a newer version of the application available, please update.

ONLINE_BANKING.OPTION_1_CONTENT: To access BMO Online Banking you will need your BMO Debit Card and the account number(s) linked to your card. You will also be asked some security questions.
ONLINE_BANKING.OPTION_2_CONTENT: To register for Online Banking, you will need your BMO Credit Card. You will also be asked some additional security questions.

ACCOUNT_SUMMARY.NO_BANK_ACCOUNTS: You do not have any Bank Accounts

FORCED_UPDATE.TITLE: Please Update
FORCED_UPDATE.MESSAGE: While some menu options are available, full functionality will not be available until you update.

ERROR.CODE: Message with %spots% for %dynamic% content and substitutions.
